file.js(2,2): error TS2683: 'this' implicitly has type 'any' because it does not have a type annotation.

file.js(15,42): error TS7009: 'new' expression, whose target lacks a construct signature, implicitly has an 'any' type.
file.js(16,5): error TS2683: 'this' implicitly has type 'any' because it does not have a type annotation.


==== file.js (5 errors) ====
    const SomeConstructor = function Named() {
    	this.x = 1;
    	~~~~

        if (!(this instanceof Named)) return new Named();
